function ERI_EP05_04()
    --.起-3【1月第3週】「ボクの帰る場所」
    SaveData.Title = "ボクの帰る場所"

    --//BG：病室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav",2000,true)

    --//SE：ノックの音
PLAY_SE("SEb009.wav")
WAIT(500)

    --//BU：モブ女性×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nurse_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nurse】
 "I'm going to change the bed sheets, so please excuse me for a moment." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nurse_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nurse】
 "You... look pale. There's no way you haven't eaten for days, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nurse_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nurse】
 "I understand you're worried about your sister, but you should go home soon. Your family must be worried too." ]])
    --//CI：アキラBU笑顔 102
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000ab")
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_AKI01eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,100)
    SET_CUTIN_01_3L(100, 500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0781.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "There's no one who worries about me." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0782.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I've betrayed the expectations of many people... I can't show my face to anyone." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    RESET_CUTIN_01(100, 500)

PLAY_VOICE("nurse_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nurse】
 "...I see. Then it's fine. We've been ordered from above to leave you alone anyway." ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    MSG([[ The nurses quickly changed the sheets on Marika-neesan’s bed and then hurriedly left the room. ]])

    --//CG：姉にすがるミナト（虚ろな目）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV024ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ It was just me and my sister alone again. I decided to stay with Marika-neesan until the time limit on her life-prolonging treatment came. ]])

    MSG([[ That was the only atonement I, useless for failing to save Marika-neesan, could do. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0783.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I'll always be with you, Marika-neesan." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0699.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "I finally found you, this demon emperor siscon darky." ]])
    -- //アキラ

    --//CG：姉にすがるミナト（アキラ登場）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV024ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ Hearing a familiar voice, I turned around and saw Akira standing there defiantly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0784.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "A-Akira." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0785.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "How did you get in? Daria said visitations other than me were prohibited." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0700.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Of course I snuck in. Right now, Lira-pon is causing a huge commotion with her specialty, ‘orders,’ against the doctors and nurses." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0701.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "We don't have time. Come on, let's go home." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira took my hand and gently smiled at me. ]])

    MSG([[ That smile softened my heart. For the first time in a while, my frozen heart seemed to regain warmth. ]])

    MSG([[ But I couldn’t hold her hand back. I wasn’t qualified to return the grip. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0786.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Where... are you telling me to go home?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0702.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Mi-Mina-chin?" ]])

    --//CG：姉にすがるミナト（泣くミナト、驚くアキラ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV024ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0787.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I don’t have anywhere to go home to anymore. Everyone found out that I cross-dress... I can’t go to Yuriai Private Academy anymore." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0703.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Y-You do have a home, don’t you? We have the room we live in, after all." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0704.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Let's go home for now and talk about what comes next like we always do. We'll overcome the hardships together, just the two of us again." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0788.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "There’s no need to discuss anything anymore. There’s no reason for me to live with Akira any longer." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0789.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I can’t save Marika-neesan. My reason to keep trying is gone. Everything Akira worked so hard for has been ruined by me." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0790.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "There’s no longer any reason for me to come home. If there is, tell me—the reason why I should come home with Akira." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0705.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "W-Well, the r-reason is! Th-That..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0791.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "See? You can’t answer. You just want to mock me for my failures like always, don’t you? You want to laugh at me, don’t you!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0792.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Just leave me alone! You already hate me, don’t you!?" ]])

    --//CG：姉にすがるミナト（泣くミナト、悲しむアキラ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV024ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0706.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "There’s no way I would ever hate you, Mina-chin." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0793.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ah――" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira shed tears silently. The moment I saw that, my chest filled with regret and I couldn’t hold back the flood pouring out. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0794.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "S-Sorry, Akira... How horrible I’ve been... I, I..." ]])

    MSG([[ Once again, instead of protecting someone important, I ended up hurting them— ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0795.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "U-Uwaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhh!!!" ]])

    --//SE：扉を開く音
PLAY_SE("SEb004.wav")
WAIT(400)

    --//BG：病院の廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG010aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0707.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Mina-chin!? Wait, where are you going!?" ]])
    --//SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
WAIT(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0708.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Please don’t go, Mina-chin!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0709.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Mina-chiiiiiinnnnnn!!!" ]])
    --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP05_05")
end
